title: Magma Is Microsoft's Foundation Multimodal Model for Agentic AI
author: Kimberley Mok
description: Magma is just one component of what Microsoft sees as the future of agentic AI systems that can execute tasks in both digital and physical worlds.
cntitle: Magma 是微软用于 Agentic AI 的基础多模态模型
cndescription: Magma 只是微软认为的未来代理 AI 系统的一个组成部分，这些系统可以在数字和物理世界中执行任务。
